Galatians__05.1: Stand fast, and be not held again under the yoke of bondage.
Galatians__05.2: Behold, I Paul tell you, that if you be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.
Galatians__05.3: And I testify again to every man circumcising himself, that he is a debtor to the whole law.
Galatians__05.4: You are made void of Christ, you who are justified in the law: you are fallen from grace.
Galatians__05.5: For we in spirit, by faith, wait for the hope of justice.
Galatians__05.6: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision: but faith that worketh by charity.
Galatians__05.7: You did run well, who hath hindered you, that you should not obey the truth?
Galatians__05.8: This persuasion is not from him that calleth you.
Galatians__05.9: A little leaven corrupteth the whole lump.
Galatians__05.10: I have confidence in you in the Lord: that you will not be of another mind: but he that troubleth you, shall bear the judgment, whosoever he be.
Galatians__05.11: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? Then is the scandal of the cross made void.
Galatians__05.12: I would they were even cut off, who trouble you.
Galatians__05.13: For you, brethren, have been called unto liberty: only make not liberty an occasion to the flesh, but by charity of the spirit serve one another.
Galatians__05.14: For all the law is fulfilled in one word: Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
Galatians__05.15: But if you bite and devour one another; take heed you be not consumed one of another.
Galatians__05.16: I say then, walk in the spirit, and you shall not fulfill the lusts of the flesh.
Galatians__05.17: For the flesh lusteth against the spirit: and the spirit against the flesh; for these are contrary one to another: so that you do not the things that you would.
Galatians__05.18: But if you are led by the spirit, you are not under the law.
Galatians__05.19: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are fornication, uncleanness, immodesty, luxury,
Galatians__05.20: Idolatry, witchcrafts, enmities, contentions, emulations, wraths, quarrels, dissensions, sects,
Galatians__05.21: Envies, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like. Of the which I foretell you, as I have foretold to you, that they who do such things shall not obtain the kingdom of God.
Galatians__05.22: But the fruit of the Spirit is, charity, joy, peace, patience, benignity, goodness, longanimity,
Galatians__05.23: Mildness, faith, modesty, continency, chastity. Against such there is no law.
Galatians__05.24: And they that are Christ's, have crucified their flesh, with the vices and concupiscences.
Galatians__05.25: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
Galatians__05.26: Let us not be made desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying on another.
